name: Thanks for Applying
subject: Thanks for Applying for {{job.title}} at Curacel
htmlBody:
Hello {{candidate.name}}, 

Hope you are well. 

We received your application for {{job.title}} position. 

We will be in touch as we progress through the process.

Cheers
